data.title: Bachelorette weekend
data.text: We visited charleston for a bachelorette weekend in February with 10 total girls! We had Marshall as our tour guide and everything from the quick responses to the company and the friendliness of everyone we were in contact with was amazing. We had to change the time of our tour last minute and the company was more than accommodating. Marshall was so full of interesting knowledge and stories about charleston history and even enjoyed some great drinks with us. He showed us some great bars while always keeping us interested and having fun! We will never forget Marshall and his southern hospitality -he had to tame our crazy group and he did with class and humor! We loved everything about this tour from the bars he chose to bring us to , to the storied he told! A definite for anyone visiting Charleston! We never would have known about the bars Marshall took us too! We miss it already! Thank you!

data.title: Really enjoyed this!
data.text: We make a habit of always taking a number if walking tours in every city we visit and have to say this was one of the best ones we have been on. Very interesting history that was not covered on the more conventional tours and some wonderful bars you may not have found in your own! Fun group as well...highly recommend it if you like history and bars.

data.title: Meeting new friends
data.text:
This was really cool
 It appears that everyone was out and about having a good time. Met some locals and some from all around. This was a great way to unwind with adults and enjoy the local sites.

data.title: Fun and informative
data.text: This was my first trip to Charleston so I wanted to get a little history lesson. I thought this would be a fun way to do just that. Our tour guide Michael was excellent! He was so knowledgeable! The tour was more like having beers with a good friend that has really interesting stories. I would recommend this tour to any one. We had a blast!

data.title: GREAT TIME, and informative too!
data.text: A great way to spend a late afternoon getting to know some interesting bars and a lot of historical facts.  Alan was the best!  We felt so comfortable with him within a few minutes of our stroll.  He is so knowledgable about Charleston history and it is obvious that he loves what he does.  I do not hesitate to recommend this tour!!!

data.title: A must do!
data.text: Excellent way to spend an evening!! Absolute blast and you let a ton of history! A must do!!! If you're only in town for one night, get your night out and tour in one!

data.title: Best Tour EVER
data.text: I had the best time on this tour! Mike worked for the Historical Society for years and his knowledge of Charleston's history is endless. His family has been in Charleston for five generations! He knows everything there is to know about this beautiful place including where all of the great pubs are located. DO NOT EAT before you go on this tour! You will have a chance to eat and drink at some amazing places all while learning about Charleston's history. It was great getting to know Mike and he took the time to get to know each of of us. As others have said, he was engaging, easy to talk to, and all around fun to be around. I would take this tour again!

data.title: Very informative and great places to drink!
data.text: Mike was an excellent guide.  Not only was he informative but he was very easy to talk to and took a real interest in each of us.  He answered all questions and engaged in constant conversation (except when we were eating or drinking).  Tour went on longer than originally stated and he was ok with that.  He seemed to enjoy it as much as we did!  Mike really knew his history (4th generation Charlestonian).  Good times!

data.title: Best thing EVER
data.text: We're in Charleston for our honeymoon, and we expected the pub stroll to be fun, but nothing mind blowing. Lo and behold,  MINDS BLOWN! Mike was our guide, and he was FABULOUS. He shared fun Charleston history, involved guests in his stories, and was flexible according to what the group was interested in. He was fantastic at checking in with folks at each spot while still allowing people time amongst themselves. He did an excellent job of facilitating interaction & cohesion among the  larger group.  For a couple of psychologists, that's an impressive, important skill, and Mike certainly mastered it. He did such a stellar job that the majority of the group (9 people from 3 "families") and Mike ended up extending the fun by heading out to a dancey dance club after the official tour had concluded. All in all, SO. MUCH. FUN. Also, Mike assured us that we were - hands down - the best tour group ever. EVER. 😉

data.title: Pub Tour
data.text: During a recent girlfriend weekend away in Charleston, we had a fantastic tour with Marshall. We visited some great places and his knowledge of the area, the history and the stories was really great. Ask for Marshall, he will take care of you!  We can't wait to go back and would definitely do this pub tour again! Thanks for the great intro to Charleston!

data.title: Great experience everyone should try!
data.text: I am currently in Charleston for a travel job assignment. So, I tried out the Pub Stroll to find out more about locations downtown. Ending up being a blast! Met some wonderful people, great bars that I will continue to venture back to and the guide was so much fun with lots of knowledge about the history and places to go. I definitely recommend going on a pub stroll to everyone that visits Charleston.

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review.  We're thrilled that you had a good time!
Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unexpectedly Pleasant
data.text: We had an awesome time at the pub crawl! More than we could have asked for. We were pleasantly surprised as we were unsure of what to expect. Mike was a brilliant guide who was very knowledgeable, fun-loving and always kept the group involved. The many stops were perfect to summarize the history of Charleston and we learned a lot and better yet had a great night. Could not have asked for more

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the kind words... and for taking the time to post them!  We're so glad that you enjoyed the Pub Stroll.  
Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Aaaaarrrrgggghhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!
data.text: We were really pleasantly surprised with how much fun we had on the Charles Towne Pub Stroll.  We spent Thanksgiving weekend in Charleston (our first trip to that wonderful city) and wanted to have a fun way to get a little "behind the scenes" history of Charleston.  I was a little skeptical when we linked up with our guide and he was fully decked out as a pirate, but he was hilarious and very knowledgeable of the city's hidden history.  We hit 5 pubs, all good calls.  Our guide was really personable and made the evening very memorable.  Highly recommend.

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank for taking the time to review us, and thanks for the recommendation!  We're glad that you enjoyed the tour.  Michael, our pirate guide for the Pub Stroll, is a virtual encyclopaedia of Charleston history and a great storyteller.

Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Had a great time!
data.text: We had a great time on this tour.  Alan, our guide, was wonderful.  We enjoyed all the pubs he took us to and we made some great new friends.  We even went back to one of pubs after the tour was over with some others from the group!  Would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to enjoy the nightlife in Charleston.

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for posting the review and for the recommendation!  We're glad that you enjoyed the tour and made some new friends.  Alan actually started the Pub Stroll.  When he's not touring pubs, he's the director of one of the museums in Charleston.  

Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Experience
data.text: We took this tour on Friday night.  The tour guide, Alan, was humorous but also knowledgeable about the history of Charleston.  We enjoyed the different pubs he took us in, but wished we weren't leaving the next day so we could go back to them!  I would say this is a must-do for adults visiting Charleston!

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to post a review!  We're glad that you enjoyed your tour with Alan.   Hope you can make it back to Charleston to spend a little more time in those pubs!  

Thanks, also, for the recommendation.
Sabrina Lavender
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Fun
data.text: Took this tour on Friday night.  Michael our pirate guide was fantastic. We visited 4 pubs had drinks and snacks at each and were regaled with wonderful history and stories of Charleston.  I would recommend this as a Must Do!

owner_response.author: PubStroll, Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We're glad that you enjoyed the tour!  Thank you for the "must do" recommendation.  
Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great time!
data.text:
My husband and I enjoyed this on our first night in Charleston.  It was a great experience and the timing was perfect for us because we had just arrived so this gave us a great overview of what downtown Charleston is all about.

Loved the unique places he took us and really enjoyed our tour guide.  Highly recommend this!

owner_response.author: PubStroll, Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We're so glad that you enjoyed the tour.  It is a great introduction to the city!  Hope you enjoyed the rest of your stay in Charleston. 

Thank you for taking the time to post a review!
Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: History and Beverages
data.text: Our tour guide was excellent. He talked of the old city, but also made everyone laugh. he was very relaxed and laid back. I wish I could remember his name...!  We had lots of fun and the appetizer served at the bars with our drinks were an added benefit. It was nice to walk a little and then take a break and enjoy a drink and then walk more! My husband and myself both enjoyed this walking tour.

data.title: Pubs, Pirates, Prohibition OH MY!
data.text: EXCELLENT TOUR! Our guide was great, he was dressed in colonial period attire and did the pub tours for fun on the side of his full time museum guide job. He was an absolute wealth of knowledge and  regaled us with stories of pirates and blind tigers and even a priest who was sent back to Ireland for baptizing a bear cub! It was cool getting drinks at the historic watering holes of Charleston and getting to be part of a group even though my husband and I were just in town by ourselves. It made for a really fun night out and we continued to bar hop even after the tour was over at 8pm, we saw other members from the group out and about on the town, it was great! Highly recommend!

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to write a review!  We are very fortunate to have such knowledgeable guides, who also happen to be very entertaining!  All of our guides are full-time historians, and three have written books on Charleston history.

We're glad that you enjoyed the tour and that we were able to get your evening off to a great start!

Again, thank you... 
Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Tour......EXCEPT....
data.text: Myself, along with seven other women in my family did this tour this past weekend and had a great time.  Alan, our guide was informative, fun and a great leader of our group.  I couldn't say one negative thing about this tour EXCEPT our visit into the liquor (ABC) store on the corner of Exchange St and East Bay. Alan was filling us with historical information on that area of the city and telling us the history of the liquor store and said to go inside and take a look if we would like.  My husband and I have been in it a few times and think it's really neat, so I brought the ladies in for them to see for themselves.  Well so much for a warm, southern welcome, the owner was extremely RUDE, told us this was not part of the tour and didn't appreciate it that we were "browsing" and he was closing, it was 6:40 pm, the sign said closes at 7pm.  So much for the bottle of wine my cousin was going to buy, we turned around and walked out, but not without him slamming the door on the back of my foot.  I frequent Charleston often, but I will make sure I bring what I am going to drink, this is what I recommend to anyone.  Don't waste your time giving this rude business owner your business, that's right, he is the owner not an employee.  My group felt so bad for Alan, we could see that he was embarrassed.  I'm sure the Charles Towne Pub Stroll guides will never tell their groups to go check out the liquor store anymore......Way to go rude store owner!!!

owner_response.author: PubStroll, General Manager at The Charles Towne Pub Stroll, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for posting the review.  We're glad that you enjoyed the tour.  I'm sure that the issue at the liquor store was a misunderstanding, as the folks there are always very gracious.  Please understand that in SC, liquors MUST have everyone out of the store and the door locked by 7pm per state law or face major fines and loss of license. 

Again, thank you for posting the review.
Sabrina
owner_response.title: Owner Response
